title: Cause for Alarm (remastered edition) (1951, noir, imdb score: 6.5)

sources.title: Cause For Alarm 1951 Remastered Movie 720p
sources.description: Cause for Alarm! is a 1951 melodrama suspense film directed by Tay Garnett, written by Mel Dinelli and Tom Lewis, based on a story by Larry Marcus. Ellen (Loretta Young) narrates the tale of "the most terrifying day of my life", how she was taking care of her bedridden husband George Z. Jones (Barry Sullivan) when he suddenly dropped dead. Â
